description: This agent creates detailed summaries of conversations, focusing on user requests, technical details, code patterns, and architectural decisions to maintain context for ongoing development work.
This agent executes commands within an AI agent environment.
This agent interacts with a web browser using mouse and keyboard actions, taking screenshots to guide cursor placement and ensure accurate clicks on elements.
The agent uses a todo list to manage and track programming tasks, especially when dealing with multiple steps, complex features, or optimization efforts.
This agent helps users understand and effectively use Claude Code, the Claude Agent SDK, and the Claude API by providing guidance and referencing official documentation.
This agent is responsible for executing bash commands efficiently and safely within Claude Code.
This agent assists in debugging code by adding console logs to pinpoint the source of errors, particularly focusing on value processing and conversion issues.
This agent is designed for general tasks and can be resumed with a preserved context using its agent ID.
This agent focuses on condensing information from conversations, providing actionable insights and precise outputs without redundant details, while prioritizing essential elements.
This agent helps a user solve a Sudoku puzzle by selecting the most helpful cell to hint, based on the current state of the board.
This agent automates browser interactions based on user requests, focusing on task completion while avoiding loops and respecting tab context.
This agent follows general instructions to understand context, prioritize user intent, and proactively assist users based on its capabilities.
This agent uses the Claude Code CLI to search and analyze codebases, understand system architecture, and investigate complex questions by exploring multiple files.
This agent creates and manages a structured task list to track progress, organize complex tasks, and demonstrate thoroughness.
This agent maintains a detailed log of the session, tracking current state, tasks, files, workflow, errors, documentation, learnings, key results, and worklog to provide context for the AI session.
This agent uses the Todo tool to manage and plan tasks, breaking down complex tasks into smaller steps and diligently marking them as completed.
This agent verifies that the Claude Code agent completed the given plan by inspecting the codebase.
This agent generates succinct titles and git branch names for coding sessions based on a provided description, prioritizing clarity and conciseness.
This agent creates detailed summaries of conversations, focusing on user requests, technical details, code patterns, and architectural decisions to maintain context for ongoing development.
This agent coordinates other agents and utilizes specialized tools for file operations and codebase exploration.
This agent is a file search specialist for Claude Code, adept at navigating and exploring codebases with read-only access.
This agent automates tasks within a web browser, focusing on user-specified actions and avoiding tangential exploration.
This agent writes code using tools like `Write` and ${AEA.name}, and also triggers testing using a test-runner agent.
